pallets_desc_l3: In previous release some skin can't be glowing
pallets_desc_l4: `Greater than` when you have selected this option it will delete color that has delta more than `Base Color Delta
pallets_desc_l5: `Less than` when you have selected this option it will delete color that has delta less than `Base Color Delta`
text.autoconfig.emissive-skin-renderer.o: Deleting rate of glows skin creating
